channel.title: Chrysanthemum Morifolium on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Chrysanthemum Morifolium on funPlantGenes

item.title: ClCRY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClCRY2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: ClCRY2 facilitates floral transition in Chrysanthemum lavandulifolium by affecting the transcription of circadian clock-related genes under short-day photoperiods.

item.title: CmANR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmANR1 Gene Name: MADS-box TF Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified bric-a-brac, tramtrack and broad (BTB) and transcription adapter putative zinc finger (TAZ) domain protein CmBT1 as the interacting partner of CmANR1 through a yeast-two-hybrid (Y2H) screening library.

item.title: CmBBX19
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: UN68402 Gene Symbol: CmBBX19 Gene Name: BBX19 protein Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmBBX22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3_sc004370.1_g0600.1 Gene Symbol: CmBBX22 Gene Name: BBX transcription factor 22 Genome: Chrysanthemum seticuspe genome release CSE_r1.

item.title: CmBBX5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmBBX5 Gene Name: the subgroup II B-box 5 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmBBX5, a B-box subgroup I member comprising two B-boxes and a CCT domain, interacts with CmBBX8.

item.title: CmBBX8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmBBX8 Gene Name: the subgroup II B-box 8 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmBES1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmBES1 Gene Name: BRI1-EMS-SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmbHLH16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmbHLH16 Gene Name: Chrysanthemum morifolium basic helix-loop-helix16 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmBPE2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DN58070_c2_g1 Gene Symbol: CmBPE2 Gene Name: Chrysanthemum morifolium BIGPETAL2 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmBT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmBT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified bric-a-brac, tramtrack and broad (BTB) and transcription adapter putative zinc finger (TAZ) domain protein CmBT1 as the interacting partner of CmANR1 through a yeast-two-hybrid (Y2H) screening library.

item.title: CmCCD4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmCCD4a Gene Name: Carotenoid Cleavage Dioxygenase4 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Carotenoid Cleavage Dioxygenase (CmCCD4a) Contributes to White Color Formation in Chrysanthemum Petals.

item.title: CmCCD4a-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmCCD4a-2 Gene Name: Carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor complex CmAP3-CmPI-CmUIF1 modulates carotenoid metabolism by directly regulating the carotenogenic gene CmCCD4a-2 in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmCIB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmCIB1 Gene Name: CRYPTOCHROME-INTERACTING bHLH1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The GA-receptor CmGID1B plays an important role in integrating photoperiod information from the CmCIB1-PHR2 complex and plant age from the cmo-miR156-CmSPL3 module to coordinate endogenous GA levels and signal perception.

item.title: CmDFR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmDFR Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmDFR, which encodes the key enzyme in anthocyanin biosynthesis.

item.title: CmDOF18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmDOF18 Gene Name: DOF TF 18 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmDOF18 positively regulates salinity tolerance in Chrysanthemum morifolium by activating the oxidoreductase system.

item.title: CmDREB6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmDREB6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Over-expression of chrysanthemum CmDREB6 enhanced tolerance of chrysanthemum to heat stress.

item.title: CmERF110
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: SRP070731 Gene Symbol: CmERF110 Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmERF12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmERF12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum embryo development is negatively affected by a novel ERF transcription factor, CmERF12。 CmERF12 negatively affects chrysanthemum embryo development.

item.title: CmERF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmERF4 Gene Name: ERF VIIIa 4 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: A group VIIIa ethylene-responsive factor, CmERF4, negatively regulates waterlogging tolerance in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmERF5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmERF5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmERF5-CmRAP2.

item.title: CmFLK
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmFLK Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS KH DOMAIN Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmFNSII-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene0057769 Gene Symbol: CmFNSII-1 Gene Name: flavones synthase II gene Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The predominant flavones in the ray florets of chrysanthemum flowers are apigenin and its derivatives, of which the contents are highly correlated with the expression of flavones synthase II gene CmFNSII-1.

item.title: CmFTL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene22450 Gene Symbol: CmFTL1 Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmFTL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmFTL2 Gene Name: flowering locus T-like 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmFTL2 is involved in the photoperiod- and sucrose-mediated control of flowering time in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmGID1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmGID1B Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmHLB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmHLB Gene Name: HLH PROTEIN INVOLVED IN LIGNIN BIOSYNTHESIS Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmHSFA4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmHSFA4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum CmHSFA4 gene positively regulates salt stress tolerance in transgenic chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmHY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmHY5 Gene Name: ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL5 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmHY5 functions in apigenin biosynthesis by regulating flavone synthase II expression in chrysanthemum flowers.

item.title: CmJAZ1-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene2375 Gene Symbol: CmJAZ1-like Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmLEC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CL4474.Contig1 Gene Symbol: CmLEC1 Gene Name: LEAFY COTYLEDON1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CmLEC1 positively regulates the seed-setting rate in hybridization breeding of chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmMAF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cluster-17868.118397 Gene Symbol: CmMAF2 Gene Name: AFFECTING FLOWERING 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum MAF2 regulates flowering by repressing gibberellin biosynthesis in response to low temperature.

item.title: CmMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmMYB2 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Regulation of flowering time in chrysanthemum by the R2R3 MYB transcription factor CmMYB2 is associated with changes in gibberellin metabolism.

item.title: CmMYB6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CL4673.Contig1_All homolog Gene Symbol: CmMYB6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmMYB6, a core member of the MBW protein complex that promotes anthocyanin biosynthesis in chrysanthemum, to activate its expression.

item.title: CmNAC25
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene39896_All Gene Symbol: CmNAC25 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmNAC25 targets CmMYB6 to positively regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis during the post-flowering stage in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmNF-YB8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: UN088090 Gene Symbol: CmNF-YB8 Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmNPR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: c81720_g1 Gene Symbol: CmNPR1 Gene Name: nonexpressor of pathogenesis-related gene 1 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmNRRa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmNRRa Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmNRRa, an orthologous gene of OsNRRa that regulates root growth in response to nutrient stress in rice, was identified from Chrysanthemum and its role in flowering time was studied.

item.title: CmPHR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmPHR2 Gene Name: PHOTOLYASE/BLUE LIGHT RECEPTOR2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmCIB1 or CmPHR2 regulates the transition time from the juvenile phase to the adult phase in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmPT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmPT1 Gene Name: phosphate transporter 1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: A putative high affinity phosphate transporter, CmPT1, enhances tolerance to Pi deficiency of chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmRAP2.3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CL4854.Contig1 Gene Symbol: CmRAP2.3 Gene Name: ethylene-responsive VII transcription factor Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmERF5-CmRAP2.

item.title: CmSOS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmSOS1 Gene Name: The Na+/H+ antiporter SOS1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of CmSOS1 confers waterlogging tolerance in Chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmSVP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: evm. TU. Scaffold_5250.69 Gene Symbol: CmSVP Gene Name: SHORT VEGETATIVE PHASE Genome: Chrysanthemum Genome Database (http://210.

item.title: CmTCP20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene7371 Gene Symbol: CmTCP20 Gene Name: TEOSINTE BRANCHED1/CYCLOIDEA/PROLIFERATING CELL FACTOR20 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmTEM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene50848_All Gene Symbol: CmTEM1 Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmWRKY15-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmWRKY15-like Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Isolated CmWRKY6–1 from chrysanthemum ‘Jinba’ and identified it as a transcriptional repressor localized in the nucleus via subcellular localization and transcriptional activation assays.

item.title: CmWRKY53
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmWRKY53 Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmWRKY6-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmWRKY6-1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmWRKY6–1–CmWRKY15-like transcriptional cascade negatively regulates the resistance to fusarium oxysporum infection in Chrysanthemum morifolium.

item.title: CmYAB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: c47017_g1 Gene Symbol: CmYAB1 Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: DgATX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgATX Gene Name: Chrysanthemum morifolium ARABIDOPSIS HOMOLOG OF TRITHORAX Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: DgbZIP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgbZIP3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: DgbZIP3 interacts with DgbZIP2 to increase the expression of DgPOD for cold stress tolerance in chrysanthemum.

item.title: DgMYB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgMYB Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: DgMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgMYB2 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: DgMYB2 improves cold resistance in chrysanthemum by directly targeting DgGPX1.

item.title: DgnsLTP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgnsLTP Gene Name: nonspecific lipid transfer protein Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Ubiquitin membrane yeast two-hybrid (MYTH) system and bimolecular fluorescence complementation (BIFC) assays showed that DgTIL1 interacts with a nonspecific lipid transfer protein (DgnsLTP), which can promote peroxidase (POD) gene expression and POD activity to reduce the accumulation of reactive oxygen species (ROS) and improve resistance to cold stress in DgnsLTP transgenic chrysanthemum.

item.title: DgTIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgTIL1 Gene Name: temperature-induced lipocalin-1-like Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified a temperature-induced lipocalin-1-like gene (DgTIL1) from chrysanthemum and showed that it was notably induced in response to cold stress.

item.title: DgTIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgTIL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Lysine crotonylation of DgTIL1 at K72 modulates cold tolerance by enhancing DgnsLTP stability in chrysanthemum.
